definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: reap, harvest (NH id., also [[קָחִיר]] harvest; cf. As. ḳaṣâru join together, collect; v. Dl:Pr 166 f. Zehnpf:BAS i. 503 (not Syr. qt.ar bind, Eth. qes’ara: [qez’ara] constringere, v. Nö:ZMG xl (1886), 735));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[קָחָָרוּ]] Je 12:13, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִקְחוֹר]] Is 17:5, Ec 11:4 + Pr 22:8 Kt (Qr [[יִקְחָר־]]); 3 mpl. [[יִקְחׂרוּן]] Ru 2:9, etc.; Imv. mpl. [[קִחְרוּ]] Ho 10:12 + ; Inf. cstr. [[לִקְחׂר]] 1Sa 8:12 +; sf. [[קֻחְרֶָךָ]] Le 23:22, [[קֻחְרְכֶם]] Le 19:9, Le 23:22; Pt. [[קוֹחֵר]] Je 9:21 +, etc.:—reap, c. acc. of crop: acc. cogn. [[קָחִיר]] 1Sa 6:13, 1Sa 8:12 (+ [[חָרִשׁ]]), Le 19:9, Le 23:10, Le 23:22 (all H) De 24:19; acc. of grain Is 17:5 (fig.; ‖ [[אָסַף]]), Job 24:6 (Qr; Kt vid.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: ), cf. Le 25:5 (H), v:Le 25:11 (P; + [[זָרַע]]), so (obj. om.) 2Ki 19:29 = Is 37:30, Mic 6:15 (opp. [[זָרַע]]), Le 19:9 b, Le 23:22 b, Ru 2:9, Ec 11:4 (+ [[זָרַע]]); obj. [[קׂחִים]] Je 12:13 (opp. [[זָרַע]]); Pt. = reaper Am 9:13 ( + [[חוֹרֵשׁ]]), Je 9:21 (sim.), Ps 129:7 (‖ [[מְעַמֵּר]]), + Is 17:5 (for [[קָחִיד]], so Buhl:Lex 13 Marti); pl. 2Ki 4:18, Ru 2:3, Ru 2:4, Ru 2:5, Ru 2:6, Ru 2:7, Ru 2:14; fig. of reaping fruits of righteousness Ho 10:12 (+ [[זָרַע]]), of evil Ho 8:7 (both + [[זָרַע]]), Ho 10:13 ( + [[חָרָשׁ]]), Job 4:8 (+ [[חָרַשׁ]], [[זָרַע]], Pr 22:8; Ps 126:5 they that sow ([[זָרַע]]) in tears shall reap in joy.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יקחירו]] Job 24:6 Kt (< Qr [[יִקְחָוֹרוּ]], v. supr.).
